snippet: There are 35 possible ways to win a best-of-seven World Series. Seven of them have never occurred in the 104 years in which a best-of-seven championship series has been played.
abstract: There are 35 possible ways to win a best-of-seven World Series. Seven of them have never occurred in the 104 years in which a best-of-seven championship series has been played.

headline.main: Keeping Score: Over in Four About a Fifth of the Time
